title: Winter Express
creator_credit: United States Information Agency and Anthony Loeb
brief_description: The story of a one-man small town weekly newspaper and the man who run it in Winters, California. The publisher is also a reporter, editor, printer, and distributor. Tells how a weekly functions and how is reflects the virtues of a small town in the United States - an example of the free press.
